Australia's southeast sweats in heatwave, lifting bushfire riskLarge swaths of Australia on Saturday sweated through severe heatwave conditions that lifted bushfire risk in the country's southeast. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 00:00:21 GMT TXFAEGUQQZIPXGS6TWMNFTE4GI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-southeast-sweats-heatwave-lifting-bushfire-risk-2024-03-09/Reuters商业环境
Worker dies in accident at Codelco's Radomiro Tomic mine in northern ChileChilean state-owned mining company Codelco said that a worker died in an accident on Friday afternoon at Radomiro Tomic copper mine in the country's north. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 22:42:21 GMT K3YJURSWT5MN3HBR2GJ6FDG2EU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/worker-dies-accident-codelcos-radomiro-tomic-mine-northern-chile-2024-03-08/Reuters世界美洲
As UN urges Sudan truce, Russia and China cite GazaThe United Nations Security Council on Friday called for an immediate cessation of hostilities in Sudan, prompting China to remind it not to forget about the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza and Russia to accuse the United States of double standards. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 22:15:40 GMT B7X3MIXOMBND7PMFF7C5PSNWTI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-urgent-sudan-truce-Russia-china-cite-gaza-2024-03-08/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
Putin lauds Russian women for motherhood, beautyPresident Vladimir Putin heaped praise on Russian women on Friday, International Women's Day, singling them out for providing the gifts of motherhood, charm and beauty, part of a long-running campaign to boost the country's birth rate. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 21:34:46 GMT 5DS4KS6GCFITDBFN5VYXF4GNKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-prases- Russian-women-motherhood-beauty-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Portuguese parties wrap up campaign ahead of Sunday's electionSurrounded by upbeat supporters, Portuguese party leaders braved the pouring rain on Friday to wrap up two weeks of campaigning for what is set to be a tight election that could end eight years of Socialist rule. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 21:31:02 GMT SS6OQCLBGNMSXCDDK3PHYS7UKBE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portuguese-parties-wrap-up-campaign-ahead-sundays-election-2024-03-08/Catarina Demony, David Latona世界欧洲
UNRWA report says Israel coerced some agency employees to falsely admit Hamas linksThe U.N. agency for Palestinian refugees said some employees released into Gaza from Israeli detention reported having been pressured by Israeli authorities into falsely stating that the agency has Hamas links and that staff took part in the Oct. 7 attacks. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 21:16:11 GMT DAX2OKPCFZMS7AKZLTQBGR4IVA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unrwa-report-says-israel-coerced-some-agency-employees-to-falsely-admit-hamas-links-2024-03-08/Reuters世界中东地区
Biden's port for aid to Gaza might not be ready for 60 days: PentagonU.S. President Joe Biden's plan to build a floating U.S. military port to speed up aid to Gaza could take up to 60 days to become a reality and involve more than 1,000 American troops, the Pentagon said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 21:06:22 GMT 7IQGVN3O4FMZDOB3FMES2G5P2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-building-gaza-port-likely-to-take-up-60-days-2024-03-08/Phil Stewart, Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
Congo prosecutor seeks 20-year jail sentence for journalistA prosecutor in the Democratic Republic of Congo has asked a court in the capital Kinshasa to sentence journalist Stanis Bujakera to 20 years in prison, one of his lawyers said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 20:32:15 GMT FYMXCPQOYVO5ZMAO5R65ZSTCZI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-prosecutor-seeks-20-year-jail-sentence-for-journalist-2024-03-08/Reuters世界非洲
Canada says it will resume funding to the UN Palestinian refugee agencyCanada will resume funding to the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency, International Aid Minister Ahmed Hussen said on Friday, becoming one of the first international donors to announce such a move. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 20:18:28 GMT GMOWLCKOZRNT7KHRU3CV5BAXOA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-says-it-will-resume-funding-a-palestinian-refugee-agency-2024-03-08/Reuters世界美洲
Peru arrests 2 accused of planning attack on Israeli at APEC forumPeruvian police on Friday said they had captured an Iranian and a Peruvian national who allegedly were planning an attack on an Israeli person at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC), scheduled to be held later this year in the Andean nation. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 20:10:37 GMT VZWIC2EOBBLPVC6HQNEYFH4WHE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-arrests-2-accused-planning-attack-israeli-apec-forum-2024-03-08/Reuters世界美洲
Biden predicts "come to Jesus" meeting with Netanyahu over Gaza aidPresident Joe Biden said he told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that the two of them were headed for a "come to Jesus" meeting over the issue of getting humanitarian aid into Gaza, according to a video clip posted on Friday.
